name: Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets
description:
Start your hunt for hidden objects!

Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets is a hidden object puzzle adventure game in which you will find hidden objects in pictures!
Get ready for a big hidden object Journey in the mystery neon world! At each level you will have to find ten hidden objects. Each level represents a new location – manor, hotel, swimming pool, house, beach, shop, museum and much more. Enjoy the neon atmosphere of the hidden object puzzle game!
In Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets Game you have to find various hidden objects - the objects to be found will be displayed at the bottom of the screen and your task is to find them all on a big picture. Hidden items can be anywhere. Seek and find all items and complete hidden object challenges.

Why you will love “Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets” - find the objects adventure game:
- The game is completely free.
- Unusual author's drawings in a special, neon style.
- Offline mode - enjoy the Hidden Object game wherever you are!
- The game is not difficult. Just relax and have fun!
- There are no timers or time limits in the game. No need to hurry.
- Incredible seek-and-find adventure that adults and kids will love.
- 10 mysterious items in each level.
- Hints is available and will help if you get stuck

If you are looking for an amazing hidden object puzzle adventure, Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets game is what you need for fun and relax!

So what are you waiting for? Download Hidden Objects - Neon Secrets game and enjoy!
